# Plumber Notes

1. Sink drain, Tub drain - fix

1. Quote for:
	* Tub filter
	* Kitchen sink filter
	* Whole house filter
2. Questions:
	* Brand
	* Maintenance details
	* Costs and maintenance costs
	* What is filtered (PFAS, Etc)
